Nature's Wrath.name: Nature's Wrath
descriptions: Reduces the cast time of your Wrath spell by 0.1 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Wrath spell by 0.2 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Wrath spell by 0.3 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Wrath spell by 0.4 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Wrath spell by 0.5 sec.

Nature's Grasp.name: Nature's Grasp
descriptions: While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a 100% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots.  Castable in any form.  1 charge.  Lasts 45 seconds.

Unstoppable Growth.name: Unstoppable Growth
descriptions: Gives you a 25% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Entangling Roots, and increases the damage and duration of your Thorns spell by 25%.
Gives you a 50% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Entangling Roots, and increases the damage and duration of your Thorns spell by 50%.
Gives you a 75% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Entangling Roots, and increases the damage and duration of your Thorns spell by 75%.
Gives you a 100% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Entangling Roots, and increases the damage and duration of your Thorns spell by 100%.

Lunar Ray.name: Lunar Ray
descriptions: Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire and Starfire spells by 2%.
Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire and Starfire spells by 4%.
Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire and Starfire spells by 6%.
Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire and Starfire spells by 8%.
Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire and Starfire spells by 10%.

Natural Weapons.name: Natural Weapons
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by 2%, and increased your chance to hit with physical attacks by 1%.
Increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by 4%, and increased your chance to hit with physical attacks by 2%.
Increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by 6%, and increased your chance to hit with physical attacks by 3%.
Increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by 8%, and increased your chance to hit with physical attacks by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by 10%, and increased your chance to hit with physical attacks by 5%.

Natural Shapeshifter.name: Natural Shapeshifter
descriptions: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 10%.
Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 20%.
Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 30%.
Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 40%.
Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 50%.

Nature's Blessing.name: Nature's Blessing
descriptions: Increases your spell damage by an amount equal to 10% of your healing power.
Increases your spell damage by an amount equal to 20% of your healing power.
Increases your spell damage by an amount equal to 30% of your healing power.
Increases your spell damage by an amount equal to 40% of your healing power.
Increases your spell damage by an amount equal to 50% of your healing power.

Omen of Clarity.name: Omen of Clarity
descriptions: Imbues the Druid with natural energy.  Each of the Druid's damaging abilities has a chance of causing the caster to enter a Clearcasting state.  The Clearcasting state reduces the Mana, Rage or Energy cost of your next damage or healing spell or offensive ability by 100%.  Lasts 30 minutes.

Nature's Reach.name: Nature's Reach
descriptions: Increases the range of your Wrath, Entangling Roots, Faerie Fire, Moonfire, Starfire, and Hurricane spells by 10%.
Increases the range of your Wrath, Entangling Roots, Faerie Fire, Moonfire, Starfire, and Hurricane spells by 20%.

Solar Flare.name: Solar Flare
descriptions: While Barkskin is active, your chance to hit and critically strike with Wrath is increased by 50%.
While Barkskin is active, your chance to hit and critically strike with Wrath is increased by 100%.

Cosmic Impact.name: Cosmic Impact
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 33%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 66%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 100%.

Shooting Stars.name: Shooting Stars
descriptions: Reduces the cast time of your Starfire spell by 0.1 seconds, and grants your critical strikes with Moonfire and Starfire a 33% chance to stun the target for 1 second.
Reduces the cast time of your Starfire spell by 0.3 seconds, and grants your critical strikes with Moonfire and Starfire a 66% chance to stun the target for 1 second.
Reduces the cast time of your Starfire spell by 0.5 seconds, and grants your critical strikes with Moonfire and Starfire a 100% chance to stun the target for 1 second.

Nature's Grace.name: Nature's Grace
descriptions: All spell criticals grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time of your next spell by 1.5 sec.

Moonglow.name: Moonglow
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Wrath, Healing Touch, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by 5%, and causes you to regenerate 1% of your total mana every 5 seconds.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Wrath, Healing Touch, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by 10%, and causes you to regenerate 2% of your total mana every 5 seconds.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Wrath, Healing Touch, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by 15%, and causes you to regenerate 3% of your total mana every 5 seconds.

Moonfury.name: Moonfury
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by 2%.
Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by 4%.
Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by 6%.
Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by 8%.
Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by 10%.

Moonkin Form.name: Moonkin Form
descriptions: Transforms the druid into Moonkin Form.  While in this form armor is increased by 360% and all party members within 30 yards have their spell critical chance increased by 3%. While below 20% mana, the Moonkin will frenzy.  The Moonkin can only cast Balance spells, Innervate and Insect Swarm while shapeshifted.
